question.title: How to preserve document structure in mindee docTR
question.body:
Im using docTR to extract text from a pdf and then put the data in a database. for example if the pdf is like this :

Image

docTR needs to preserve the same structure so i can easily extract data but i get outputs like these :

1) 

ABC Receipt 
Nature of request 
Request Code
status of application 

aaaaa

2543522

rejected 

observation abc

2) 

ABC Receipt 
Nature of request 
aaaaa
Request Code
2543522
status of application 
rejected 
observation abc

These outputs make it difficult for me to extract data with regex (I'm doing the data extraction in java not python) so how to get the desired output ?
